comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: It seems appropriate (although I'm sure coincidental) to have Phillies photos in the batch for the week in which they won the World Series!

comment.author: 69641014@N00
comment._content: According to the "Dressed to the Nines" exhibit at the baseball hall of fame ( exhibits.baseballhalloffame.org/dressed_to_the_nines/ ) the 1910 Phillies uniforms didn't have caps with "P"s on them. Could this picture be from 1913 instead? Also, baseball-reference.com says that Erskine Mayer didn't join the Phils 'til 1912, so this photo couldn't be from 1910.
